[URLOTW] 30 seconds of code

Oct 12, 2019 ・ 1 min read

URLOTW or URL of the week or Uniform Resource Locator of the week is a kind of post where I share a relevant URL for you :-)

This week the winner is 30 seconds of code: https://github.com/30-seconds/30-seconds-of-code.

I’ve bookmarked the 30 seconds of CSS and 30 seconds of React. But, you can check there some snippets of Python as well!

I hope you enjoy it ;-)
